item.title: Updates to charts, projects and bug fixes
item.description: Added a new chart in the home page that shows you a comparison between the current expenses and your last month expenses. This provides a quick an easy way to get some insights on your expenses without leaving the home page.

item.title: New dark mode
item.description: We are excited to announce that Subly now has a dark mode! To activate the dark mode, simply go to settings and select "dark mode".

item.title: Discord integration
item.description: Connect your Discord server to Subly to receive payment reminders and never miss a payment.

item.title: Introducing: Projects, List View and more
item.description: You can now organize your subscriptions by Projects, each project has its own set of reports and statistics

item.title: Add subscriptions in your preferred currency
item.description: Sometimes we have subscriptions in different currencies, and it can make tracking our subscription expenses even more difficult. Subly can now help you with this; when you edit or add a subscription, you will be able to select the currency in which it is paid

item.title: Multiple alerts, spending projection and upcoming payments
item.description: Now you can add the payment methods you are using to your subscriptions. This will allow you to get more insightful data in your reports and more ways to organize all of your recurring expenses.

item.title: Updates to charts, projects and bug fixes
item.description: The subscription reminders have been updated, now you can set when you want to receive them

item.title: One time payments, custom categories and more
item.description: You can now add services for which you do not pay on a recurring basis. With this feature now you can use Subly to keep track of the software licenses and lifetime deals that you have

item.title: Payment Methods
item.description: Now you can add the payment methods you are using to your subscriptions. This will allow you to get more insightful data in your reports and more ways to organize all of your recurring expenses.

item.title: Search & custom icons
item.description: New features make it easier to manage subscriptions with quick search, custom icons, and "add to calendar" button for payment dates.

item.title: Slack integration
item.description: We are excited to announce a new integration with Slack! Now, users on paid plans will be able to receive payment reminders on their preferred Slack channel.

item.title: Introducing: Team members and project budgets
item.description: Invite team members to join your Subly workspace

item.title: Telegram integration & calendar view
item.description: Introducing our telegram integration and the new calendar view to visualize subscriptions

item.title: Two-factor authentication (2FA)
item.description: Webhooks allows you to connect Subly to other applications and automate tasks based on events within Subly

item.title: Introducing Webhooks
item.description: Webhooks allows you to connect Subly to other applications and automate tasks based on events within Subly
